articles.title: CCNR Spokesman Blasts S. Korean Defense Minister's Anti-DPRK Rubbish
articles.content:
CCNR Spokesman Blasts S. Korean Defense Minister's Anti-DPRK Rubbish
 Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- Song Yong Mu, defense minister of south Korea, recently talked such rubbish as "collapse of the north", not content with his reckless tongue-lashing at a meeting for "parliamentary inspection for administration" though he is stricken with the fear of imminent war.
					 This clearly shows that Song is just a die-hard confrontation maniac seized with inveterate hostility toward the compatriots in the north and the wild dream for "unification by absorption", says a spokesman for the Consultative Council for National Reconciliation in a statement Friday.
					
					 Terming his tongue-lashing an unpardonable insult to the dignity and system of the DPRK, the statement goes on:
					
					 Song spouted very dangerous provocative remarks at a time when the north-south relations have reached the worst catastrophe and a touch-and-go situation is prevailing on the Korean peninsula. This should never be overlooked.
					
					 He has fully betrayed his colors as a pro-U.S. traitor seeking to prolong his remaining days with the backing of the U.S. in utter disregard of the deadlocked north-south ties, this land embroiled in a horrible war disaster and the destiny of the nation in peril.
					
					 We have already warned that those who challenge the dignity and system of the DPRK are bound to face a merciless punishment.
					
					 Song will soon get to know clearly how dearly he should pay for his reckless tongue-lashing.
					
					 The present chief executive of south Korea can never evade his responsibility for designating such a confrontation maniac as defense minister and patronizing him.
					
					 The regime of south Korea should never forget that all Koreans are watching its behavior.

articles.title: Illustrated Manual of Korean Martial Arts Registered to Memory of World Register
articles.content:
Illustrated Manual of Korean Martial Arts Registered to Memory of World Register
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The illustrated manual of Korean martial arts "Mu Ye Do Bo Tong Ji" was recently registered to the memory of the World Register by the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO).
					 In this regard, Kim Yong Ae, section chief of the Grand People's Study House in the DPRK, told KCNA:
					
					 The manual unearthed in Sonchon County of North Phyongan Province is a military book dealing with the Korean martial art movements in a comprehensive and systematic way.
					
					 The director-general of the UNESCO approved the registration of "Mu Ye Do Bo Tong Ji" to the International Register of the Memory of the World Programme on October 30.
					
					 It is the first time for the DPRK to have its heritage registered to the memory of the World Register.
					
					 Last year, the manual was registered to the memory of the World Regional Register for Asia-Pacific.

articles.title: 48th Sports Contest of Artistes Held
articles.content:
48th Sports Contest of Artistes Held
 Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The 48th Sports Contest of Artistes took place at Kim Il Sung Stadium on Friday.
					 There were various sports events including football, basketball and volleyball during the contest, divided into the groups of cinematic art, stage art and art education.
					
					 Players fully displayed their skills and team spirit cultivated in their day-to-day training and played fair games.
					
					 The group of cinematic art took the first place in total points.
					
					 Among the spectators were Pak Kwang Ho, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture, An Tong Chun, chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of the Unions of Art and Literature of Korea, officials concerned and officials, creators, artistes, teachers and students in the field of culture and art.

articles.title: Art Performance Given in South Phyongan Province of DPRK
articles.content:
Art Performance Given in South Phyongan Province of DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The State Merited Chorus, the Moranbong Band and the Wangjaesan Art Troupe gave their music and dance performance in Anju Theatre of South Phyongan Province on Thursday.
					 Among the audience were Kim Du Il, chairman of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea; Kang Hyong Bong, chairman of the South Phyongan Provincial People's Committee; and other leading officials of the province and officials, technicians and workers at major industrial establishments in the province and other working people of various strata in Anju City.
					
					 The numbers of the performance included male solo and male chorus "Song Dedicated to the Motherly Party", female solo "Opening My Heart", mixed chorus and male chorus "We Cannot Live without You", male solo and male chorus "Korea, Forward under the Line of Simultaneously Developing the Two Fronts" and dance "Dash toward Future".
					
					 The performers well represented the greatness of the WPK with profound artistic depiction.
					
					 Narrative poem "Give full play to heroic mettle, South Phyongan Province!" represented the immortal traces of the peerlessly great men for the province, putting the audience in deep emotional memory.
					
					 Such songs as "Song of Big Fish Haul" were also put on the stage, adding to the atmosphere of the performance.
					
					 At the end of the performance the audience presented bouquets to the performers and congratulated them with warm applauses.
					
					 The performance evoked a great response from the audience.
					
					 It will continue.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Woman Centenarian Birthday Spread
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Woman Centenarian Birthday Spread
Hoeryong, November 3 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to Kim Kyong Suk, a woman centenarian who lives in Phalul-dong, Hoeryong City.
					 Being born into a poor peasant family before the liberation of the country, she keenly experienced the grief of being a member of the stateless nation, maltreated and humiliated under the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule.
					
					 It was not until President Kim Il Sung liberated Korea that she could live a genuine and happy life.
					
					 She had dedicated herself to the agricultural production in her ardent desire to repay the benefits of the Party and leader.
					
					 Having a balanced diet, she is spending her remaining years in happiness, doing some domestic chores.

articles.title: New Software Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Software Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- Scientists at the Global Environmental Information Institute under the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK developed new software for reference to natural resources which is helpful to have effective use of natural energy.
					 The software is divided into two programs--the one which deals with 3D geographical information based on satellite images and the other which enables users to search for countrywide wind, hydraulic, organic, tidal and solar energy resources.
					
					 The software is considered to be conducive to working out the strategy and plan for developing natural energy resources of the country in a scientific way.

articles.title: Kosan Army-People Power Station Inaugurated
articles.content:
Kosan Army-People Power Station Inaugurated
 Kosan, November 3 (KCNA) -- Kosan Army-People Power Station has been built at the country's leading large-scale fruit farming base.
					 Its completion helps promote the development of fruit farming and provide the inhabitants in Kosan area with better living conditions.
					
					 The power station was inaugurated with due ceremony on Friday.
					
					 Present there were officials concerned, members of the Construction Shock Brigade 618, and employees of the Kosan Combined Fruit Farm.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants went round the power station.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Stopping Imperialists from Ideological and Cultural Poisoning
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Stopping Imperialists from Ideological and Cultural Poisoning
 Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- Preventing the imperialists from ideological and cultural poisoning is an important issue related to the destiny of the socialist cause, the cause for independence against imperialism and the life and death of the country and nation, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Friday.
					 It goes on:
					
					 If the poisoning is allowed, a social system is impaired and ceases to exist in the end.
					
					 This is eloquently proved by the tragic collapses of some socialist countries.
					
					 The imperialists ratcheted up broadcasting in an attempt to create an illusion about capitalism while making reactionary publications and sexual and corrupt films and music massively infiltrate into those countries.
					
					 So there were widespread ideological and moral break-up and degeneration among people.
					
					 Those who were poisoned by the reactionary ideology and culture hated working and were attracted by capitalism.
					
					 It is crystal clear that those who discard the revolutionary faith and live only for themselves can not defend socialism, the collective society.
					
					 In the end people of those countries did nothing but saw the socialist renegades and the imperialists cat's paws, lower and trample down the socialist red flag. This is not a story of bygone days.
					
					 The present century witnessed abnormal regime changes in several countries. Those are due to the ideological and cultural poisoning and psychological warfare by the U.S.-led imperialists.
					
					 Youth are the primary target of this ideological and cultural poisoning campaign.
					
					 If the ideological education of them is neglected, they can be easily spoiled by the poisoning and troublemakers of the society.
					
					 It is impossible to bring down the country having the young people politically and ideologically strong and morally good.

articles.title: Japan's Anti-DPRK Racket under Fire
articles.content:
Japan's Anti-DPRK Racket under Fire
 Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- A university assistant professor of Japan in an article titled "Prime Minister Abe politically using Korean issue" termed the gibberish about "threat from Korea" a plot of the present Japanese authorities to realize the political ambition. This is the proper criticism of the Japanese reactionaries resorting to all kinds of frauds and mendicancy while regarding the policy for confrontation with the DPRK as an inevitable means for existence, Rodong Sinmun Friday says in a commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is the vicious and bad habit of the Japanese ultra-right wing politicians to satisfy their greed for power and realize the ambition for reinvasion of Korea by taking issue with others through lies and slander without correct political idea and reasonable political view.
					
					 Now Abe forces' anti-DPRK confrontation policy has gone beyond a tolerance limit.
					
					 The confrontation policy would be a lever hastening the final ruin of Japan, not just a means to prolong remaining days as politicians.
					
					 The real threat to Japan is the reckless confrontation hysteria of the Abe forces against the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Progressive Organizations Make Surprise Attack on Venue of Secret Talks of Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors
articles.content:
S. Korean Progressive Organizations Make Surprise Attack on Venue of Secret Talks of Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors
 Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- Members of the Headquarters of the All-People Action to Punish Lee Myung Bak made a surprise attack on the venue of secret talks of the Lee group of traitors on Oct. 30 and made a protest, according to the south Korean online paper Voice of Seoul.
					 On the evening of that day, more than 30 trusted stooges of Lee Myung Bak including Kim Thae Yong, former minister of Defense, were closeted together in a pub around the traitor's house.
					
					 Meanwhile, members of the commando to arrest MB continue to stage an indefinite hunger-strike and signature campaign around the traitor's house.
					
					 They launched a demonstration calling for the arrest of the traitor outside the building of the Seoul Central District Prosecutor's Office on Nov. 1.
					
					 Hunger-strike and signature campaign will go on until traitor Lee Myung Bak gets the investigation.

articles.title: S. Korea Comes First in Suicide Rate among OECD Member Nations
articles.content:
S. Korea Comes First in Suicide Rate among OECD Member Nations
 Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Newsis on Oct. 31 said that south Korea took the first place in suicide rate among the member nations of the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD).
					 The suicide rate of south Korea is 2.4 times the average rate among OECD member states and regions and average 2.9 times old persons' suicide rate.
					
					 It was reported that south Korea has come first in suicide rate every year since the traitor Lee Myung Bak became the master of Chongwadae.

articles.title: Psychopathic Case Increases within S. Korean Puppet Army
articles.content:
Psychopathic Case Increases within S. Korean Puppet Army
 Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- Most of the discharged soldiers of the south Korean puppet army are suffering from some kinds of mental diseases, according to the south Korean Segye Ilbo on Oct. 31.
					 According to data submitted to the puppet "National Assembly" by the defense ministry, the number of soldiers discharged for mental disorders increased nearly four times in 2016 as against the figure in 2013, and over 14,200 persons were confirmed to suffer from psychosis in the last five years.

articles.title: S. Koreans Launch No-Trump, No-War Actions
articles.content:
S. Koreans Launch No-Trump, No-War Actions
 Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Trump Joint Action composed of 220 odd political parties and organizations held a no-Trump, no-war rally at the Kwanghwamun Plaza in Seoul on Nov. 1, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 Speakers at the rally said all south Koreans oppose war maniac Trump's visit to south Korea.
					
					 A declaration was read out there.
					
					 It said needless are the "summit talks" threatening war and forcing south Korea to buy weapons and the "National Assembly" agitating war and sanctions against fellow countrymen.
					
					 It noted that the Joint Action would launch strong actions in protest against the U.S. government's war threats.

articles.title: No-Trump Actions in south Korea
articles.content:
No-Trump Actions in south Korea
 Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Trump, Anti-U.S. Actions Headquarters in south Korea held a rally outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on Nov. 1 to oppose Trump's visit for war and stop the war drills against the north, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Minjok Ilbo.
					 Speakers at the rally called for defusing the danger of war and achieving peace by the independent efforts of all Koreans.
					
					 Stability can be brought about only through intensified inter-Korean cooperation, dialogue and exchange, they said.
					
					 A statement was read out there.
					
					 The statement said the only proposal for peace to defuse the danger of war it to sign a peace accord between the DPRK and the U.S.
					
					 The participants thrust a written protest into the U.S. embassy and headed for the regime building with no-Trump, no-War placards in their hands.

articles.title: Chongryon Leader Meets Representatives of June 15 Overseas Side Committee
articles.content:
Chongryon Leader Meets Representatives of June 15 Overseas Side Committee
 Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), on Oct. 24 met representatives of various regions of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration, who took part in the "Tokyo Reunification Square", an event marking the 10th anniversary of the publication of the historic October 4 Declaration, at the Korean Hall in Tokyo.
					 He said the "Tokyo Reunification Square" marked an important occasion in glorifying the exploits of the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il for national reunification and implementing the Juche-based reunification line and policy advanced by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He called upon the representatives to make positive contributions to intensifying the movement for national reunification under the banner of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: Russian Political Party Supports Korean People's Cause of Justice
articles.content:
Russian Political Party Supports Korean People's Cause of Justice
 Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The 14th plenary meeting of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation adopted a decision to support the just cause of the Korean people.
					 The decision recalled that the situation on the Korean peninsula is getting worse day by day owing to the U.S. ceaseless provocation moves targeting the DPRK.
					
					 It branded U.S. President Trump's bellicose remark of "total destruction" of the DPRK at the UN stage as a grave threat to the latter's sovereignty and security, calling his reckless remark an open declaration of war against the sovereign state as it wantonly violates the UN Charter.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The touch-and-go situation has now come to the Korean peninsula because the U.S. and its allies have stepped up war threat and unreasonable sanctions against the peace-loving Korean people.
					
					 The DPRK has beefed up its defense capabilities and had access to nuclear deterrent in a bid to cope with any invasion by hostile forces.
					
					 Socialism is the most proper way and the DPRK's experience draws attention of the world, the decision said, stressing:
					
					1. We flatly condemn all sorts of military pressure and sanctions against the DPRK.
					
					2. We protest the hostile acts of the U.S. and its allies as they destabilize the situation of the Korean peninsula.
					
					3. We express support to the cause of the DPRK to protect its sovereignty and gains of socialism.
					
					4. We will conduct more brisk solidarity movement with the DPRK and inform the people of the Khabarovsk territory of the DPRK's reality through the party's publications and mass media.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Benin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Benin
 Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The Beninese National Committee for Remembering General Kim Jong Il was formed in Cotonou on Oct. 23.
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea who doubles as chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader", was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the feats performed leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of his 6th demise anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Beninese Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Beninese Figures
 Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's feats were praised by Beninese figures.
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea who doubles as chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader," addressed the inaugural ceremony of the Beninese National Committee for Remembering General Kim Jong Il on Oct. 23.
					
					 He said that HE Kim Jong Il, who consolidated and developed Korean socialism centered on the masses and brought about wonderful miracles and changes in all fields, led the Korean people to show their unfathomable strength in socialist construction.
					
					 Pascal Zouncheme, rector of the Cotonou Institute of Journalism who doubles as chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, said that HE Kim Jong Il gave scientific solutions to the theoretical and practical issues arising in the accomplishment of human cause of independence through his rare and energetic ideological and theoretical activities.

articles.title: Portavoz del CRN condena al ministro de Defensa Nacional surcoreano
articles.content:
Portavoz del CRN condena al ministro de Defensa Nacional surcoreano
Pyongyang, 3 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El ministro de Defensa Nacional del Sur de Corea, Song Yong Mu, quien teme mucho a que se desate la guerra ahora mismo, se atrevio a hablar hasta del "derrumbe del Norte (de Corea)" en la inspeccion parlamentaria respecto al gobierno, efectuada hace poco.
					Su disparate permite conocer que el es maniaco de enfrentamiento colmado de la hostilidad a la parte connacional y de la ambicion sobre la "unificacion mediante la absorcion", asi critica el portavoz del Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional en su declaracion publicada el dia 3 y continua:
					
					Es imperdonable la chismografia de Song que significa calumnia intolerable sobre la dignidad y el regimen de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					La gravedad del caso es que el acto verbal provocativo del jefe del ejercito titere surcoreano coincide con que caen en la peor coyuntura de ruptura las relaciones intercoreanas y se torna extremadamente tensa la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Asi, Song Yong Mu demostro su atributo de vendepatria servil proyanqui que piensa solo en mantener su sucia vida adulando a EE.UU. sin importar que se rompan las relaciones Norte-Sur y se arruine el destino nacional debido a la repeticion de tremendos desastres de guerra.
					
					Ya hemos advertido claramente cuan implacable sera el castigo a los que desafien a la dignidad y regimen de la RPDC.
					
					Song comprendera pronto cuan caro le va a costar su chisme.
					
					El actual mandatario surcoreano tampoco puede eludir la responsabilidad de haber nombrado a ese tipejo conflictivo como ministro de Defensa Nacional y haberle amparado tanto.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben tener presente que toda la nacion esta observando su actitud.

articles.title: Registrado Libro Ilustrado de Artes Marciales como patrimonio mundial
articles.content:
Registrado Libro Ilustrado de Artes Marciales como patrimonio mundial
Pyongyang, 3 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Recientemente, el Libro Ilustrado de Artes Marciales de Corea fue registrado como patrimonio de memoria del mundo de la Organizacion de las Naciones Unidas para la Educacion, la Ciencia y la Cultura (UNESCO).
					Asi dijo a la reportera de la ACNC la directora del Palacio de Estudio del Pueblo, Kim Yong Ae, quien continuo:
					
					El libro fue descubierto en el distrito de Sonchon de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte. El manual militar sintetiza globalmente los movimientos de arte marcial tradicional de la nacion coreana.
					
					El 30 de octubre, el director general de UNESCO aprobo el registro del libro coreano en la "lista internacional de registro del Programa de Patrimonio de Memoria del Mundo".
					
					Asi se registro como primer patrimonio de memoria del mundo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea este libro que comprueba la historia y la superioridad de artes marciales de Corea, cuna de Taekwondo.
					
					En el ano pasado, este libro fue anotado como patrimonio de memoria de la region de Asia-Pacifico del patrimonio de memoria del mundo de UNESCO.

articles.title: Tiene lugar 48a Competencia Deportiva de Artistas
articles.content:
Tiene lugar 48a Competencia Deportiva de Artistas
Pyongyang, 3 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 3 en el Estadio Kim Il Sung la 48a Competencia Deportiva de Artistas.
					Los equipos de cinematografia, escenografia y educacion de arte compitieron en los partidos de futbol, baloncesto, voleibol, atletismo, Taekwon-do, lucha de cuerda y otras disciplinas.
					
					Los jugadores demostraron su elevado nivel tecnico, espiritu colectivista y noble moral de juego.
					
					El equipo de cinematografia logro situarse en el primer lugar de la clasificacion general. 
					
					Presenciaron la competencia el vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Pak Kwang Ho, el ministro de Cultura Pak Chun Nam, el presidente del Comite Central de la Federacion General de Escritores y Artistas de Corea, An Tong Chun, los funcionarios de ramas interesadas y los funcionarios, creadores, artistas, profesores y estudiantes del sector de cultura y arte.

articles.title: Conjuntos artisticos famosos estrenan en la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur
articles.content:
Conjuntos artisticos famosos estrenan en la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur
Pyongyang, 3 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Coro Estatal Benemerito, la Banda Moranbong y el Conjunto Artistico Wangjaesan ofrecieron con exito el dia 2 su funcion musical y coreografica en el Teatro de Anju.
					Lo presenciaron el presidente del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la Provincia de Phyong-an del Sur, Kim Du Il, el presidente del Comite Popular de la misma provincia, Kang Hyong Bong, los funcionarios, tecnicos y obreros de las principales fabricas y empresas de la provincia, asi como los trabajadores de diferentes estratos de la ciudad de Anju.
					
					En el espectaculo se presentaron el solo y coro masculinos "Cancion al Partido Madre", el solo femenino "Confesion", el coro mixto y el coro masculino "No podemos vivir sin el", el trio y coro masculinos "Por el unico camino del socialismo", el solo y coro masculinos "!Adelante, Corea, siguiendo la linea de desarrollo paralelo!", la musica ligera "De un tiron", la danza "Corramos hacia el futuro" y otras piezas.
					
					Los ejecutantes describieron en tono patetico la grandeza del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					La poseia en narracion "!Manifieste el temple heroico, la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur!" provoco la gran recordacion de todos los pasos inmortales de los grandes hombres sin iguales registradas en la tierra de la provincia.
					
					La funcion se realizo de modo sobresaliente con la interpretacion de la cancion "Pesca abundante" y otras.
					
					Cuando se termino la funcion, los visitantes felicitaron los exitos de funcion entre los espectadores quienes dieron los ramos de flores y aplausos.
					
					La funcion continua.
